::Mantle/Aqua/Cinder/Prowl::

Mantle nods, his eyes sad. Striker had been a good friend and 
commander, and Mantle was sad to discover that most of his old team 
was gone. Behind him, Aqua put a hand on Cinder's shoulder. Cinder's 
eyes were starting to fill with tears.

"What's that one's name?" Mantle asks Iron Raptor. Prowl's body, no 
longer fueled by the emotions of Iron Raptor's second beast mode, 
reverts into his robot mode, the mechfluid-stained armor glinting in 
the sun.

"Prowl!" Cinder exclaims, running forward and kneeling near Prowl, 
trying to take him into her arms.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Mantle walks forward to near Iron Raptor, watching Cinder kneeling 
near Prowl.

"Is there any way me and my group can help around here?"





--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> 
> * Iron Raptor shook her head and walked over to Prowl, looking down 
at him 
> and waiting for the SBM to ware off now that she had removed hers.
> She looked back at the group, slightly surprised when Mantle came 
forward.
> So...there was another Maximals gestalt, how nice. It was good to 
have more 
> heavy hitters on the team.
> But what they wanted to know...the answer probably wasn't what they 
wanted 
> to hear.
> Iron Raptor bent down to take Prowl's head in her arms, hoping that 
he 
> didn't wake up and suddenly bite her arm off.*
> 
> " Um...I hate to tell you this but Striker and his group don't 
exist 
> anymore."
> 
> * She heaved, trying to lift Prowls head.*
> 
> " This..." she gestured to Prowl. " This is the last of his crew 
and he was 
> attacking me but nothing I couldn't have stopped."
> 
> 
> 
>
